ascend_skill.desc:
Increase Attack based on missing HP. The minimum increase is 10%, and if HP is 20% or lower, Attack will increase by a maximum of 40%.
When Ryuji has less than 75% HP on his action, gain Rebound for 1 turn.
Rebound: Increases the damage of Ryuji's next skill by 30%, and increases critical rate by 30%.
ascend_skill.name: Wounded Glory

ascend_skill.desc: Increase damage of God Hand Burst by 20%. When in the Changing Gears state, decrease damage taken by 20%.
ascend_skill.name: Under the Skull and Bones

ascend_skill.desc: When dealing critical damage with a skill, ignore 35% of target's Defense.
ascend_skill.name: Fearless Charge

ascend_skill.desc: Increase the skill levels of God Hand Burst and Thief Tactics by 3.
ascend_skill.name: Anchor Management

ascend_skill.desc: Highlight Enhanced: Increase the next skill's damage by 30%, and increase critical damage by 75%.
ascend_skill.name: Riding the Storm

ascend_skill.desc: Increase the skill levels of Pirate Tactics and Thunderbolt by 3.
ascend_skill.name: Raise the Sails!

ascend_skill.desc:
During battle, survive fatal damage 1 time and recover 25% of HP.
After damaging a foe with God Hand Burst, inflict Cower on the target.
Cower: Increase next skill damage taken from Ryuji by 60%.
ascend_skill.name: Comeback Kid

highlight_skill.desc: Deal Physical damage to 1 foe equal to 405.0%/446.5%/429.9%/471.4% Attack, and increase damage of next skill by 58.6%/58.6%/62.2%/62.2%.
highlight_skill.name: Highlight

normal_skill.desc: Deal Physical damage to 1 foe equal to 64.7%/71.3%/68.7%/75.3% of Attack (3 hits). When Ryuji doesn't have Rebound, spend 20% of max HP to increase damage by 30% and increase critical rate by 30%.
normal_skill.name: Pirate Tactics

normal_skill.desc:
Deal Electric damage to all foes equal to 67.1%/74.0%/71.3%/78.2% of Attack, with a 29.3%/29.3%/31.1%/31.1% chance to inflict Shock.
When Ryuji has Rebound, increase chance to inflict Shock by 58.6%/58.6%/62.2%/62.2%.
normal_skill.name: Thunderbolt

normal_skill.desc:
Select 1 foe, and enter the Changing Gears state. On the next action, deal Physical damage to the target equal to 341.6%/376.6%/362.6%/397.6% of Attack.
When Ryuji has Rebound, guarantee a critical hit. If the main target is defeated while in Changing Gears, randomly select another foe.
normal_skill.name: God Hand Burst

passive_skill.desc: If the target's remaining HP is higher than Ryuji's, increase Attack by 45.0%.
passive_skill.name: Adrenaline

passive_skill.desc: When Ryuji has Rebound and uses Pirate Tactics, Thunderbolt, or God Hand Burst, restore HP equal to 30.0% of his Attack.
passive_skill.name: Rebellious Spirit
